name: I Saw Them in the Woods
name_original: I Saw Them in the Woods
description:
A game made for GMTK Game Jam 2022 !! Guwow !!

Press WASD or Arrow Keys to Move. 

Press E or Space to toggle the flashlight. 

Move around the map to collect items. Once you picked up enough Items you can place a Bow trap or a bear trap. 

Survive. 

Audio/Programmer (and mostly everything, lol): Peterson N.(@the_musical_pete on insta)

Artist/ Game Design : Leslie HM (@lesliewithart on insta)

Programming UI: Luis A.
